text:
Hey, I am just following this  video to simply upload a simple form using the starter project template.

<https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Xg3rbcRzmZs>

However when I try to upload my project I get :

The post in account 23557128 was forbidden. Failed to perform the action. `23557128` does not have access to this feature. Contact HubSpot support for assistance.

my account is super Admin and my test acount is trail and I also select all the scopes for the personal access key:
Selected scopes
`cms.functions.readcms.functions.writecms.source_code.readcms.source_code.writecrm.objects.custom.readcrm.objects.custom.writecrm.schemas.custom.readcrm.schemas.custom.writefileshubdb`

Did I miss something?
Have you opted into the beta?
If not you can opt in by clicking on you profile icon in the top right, then going to products and updates, next clicking into betas, and finally finding the crm customizability beta
